actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of individuals who have attained the age of 62 interest received during any taxable year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual age 62 or older an exclusion from gross income of all interest income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from the gross income of individuals who have attained the age of 62 interest received during any taxable year.
